DOC.brief_summary: Study assess effect food Pharmacokinetics Selumetinib ( AZD6244 ; ARRY-142886 ) ( Hyd-Sulfate ) Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Effect Food Pharmacokinetics Selumetinib ( AZD6244 ; ARRY-142886 ) ( Hyd-Sulfate ) Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , Open-label , Single-center , Crossover Study Assess Effect Food Pharmacokinetics 75 mg Single Oral Dose Selumetinib ( AZD6244 ; ARRY-142886 ) ( Hyd-Sulfate ) Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weigh least 50 kg 100 kg ( inclusive ) . 2 . Must smoke use nicotine product within previous 3 month . 3 . Have calculate creatinine clearance ( CrCL ) great 50 mL/min use CockcroftGault formula . 1 . Current past history central serous retinopathy retinal vein thrombosis , intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg uncontrolled glaucoma . 2 . Any clinically relevant abnormal finding physical examination , hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis , vital sign , ECG baseline opinion investigator . 3 . History presence clinically significant disease disorder opinion investigator . 4 . Subjects Japanese nonJapanese Asian ethnicity . 5 . Subjects one parent grandparent ( maternal paternal ) Japanese nonJapanese Asian ( e.g. , China , Taiwan , Korea , Philippines , Thailand , Vietnam Malaysia ) . Asian Indians acceptable .
DOC.keyword: Phase I , healthy , pharmacokinetics , food effect .
